class.name: CFFIType
class.brief_description: Godot class that represents an FFI type.

method.name: alloc
method.description: Allocates a new value of this type. If [param initialize_with_zeros] is true, the allocated value will be zero-initialized. Otherwise, the allocated memory will not be initialized and may contain garbage data.

method.name: alloc_array
method.description: Allocates a new array with [param size] elements of this type. [param size] must be a positive number. If [param initialize_with_zeros] is true, the allocated array will be zero-initialized. Otherwise, the allocated memory will not be initialized and may contain garbage data.

method.name: get_alignment
method.description: Get the FFI type's alignment in bytes.

method.name: get_size
method.description: Get the FFI type's size in bytes.
